personalData.title: Full Stack Developer
personalData.bio:
I‚Äôm Sudip Sharma, a full-stack developer who believes technology is more than code ‚Äî it‚Äôs a bridge between ideas and impact. From an early curiosity about how things work to a professional pursuit of building scalable, user-focused solutions, I‚Äôve always been driven by a desire to learn, create, and grow.

My mission is simple: to be happy and spread happiness through my work and interactions. Whether it‚Äôs solving complex technical challenges or exploring new technologies, I approach every project with creativity, curiosity, and a commitment to excellence.

I see every line of code as an opportunity to craft something meaningful ‚Äî to make systems smarter, users happier, and life a little better through innovation and thoughtful design.
personalData.summary: üöÄ Passionate Full-Stack Developer with over 2 years of experience crafting scalable and high-performance web applications using React, Next.js, and Node.js, enhanced with advanced AI integrations. Dedicated to building clean, intuitive user interfaces and developing robust APIs that power seamless digital experiences. Always eager to learn, innovate, and deliver cutting-edge, quality-driven solutions that make an impact.
personalData.objective: Passionate about continuous learning and building innovative applications that combine creativity, technology, and purpose.
personalData.heroBio: A passionate full-stack developer driven by curiosity, creativity, and continuous learning. I build meaningful digital experiences that inspire growth, innovation, and happiness.
personalData.hobbies: Writing Tech Blogs, Web Development, Cloud Computing, DevOps, Open Source

experiences.description: As a Backend Developer, my main responsibilities include developing scalable and efficient backend solutions while ensuring system performance and reliability. I actively collaborate in open-source projects and contribute to organizational development events. I focus on using modern tools and frameworks to build full-stack applications and integrate advanced technologies. My work also involves exploring innovative solutions such as containerization and AI integration to enhance product capability and user experience. I continue to expand my skills and update my knowledge as I grow in this field.

Developed a full-stack blog application using Next.js and NestJS with key features like full CRUD operations, user authentication & authorization, and payment integration. Gained hands-on experience in backend structuring, API management, and deploying scalable full-stack applications with strong focus on security, error handling, and performance.

educations.institution: Gandaki College of Engineering and Science ( GCES )
educations.description: I am currently pursuing a Bachelor's Degree in Software Engineering at Gandaki College of Engineering and Science, which is affiliated with Pokhara University. I began my studies in 2023.
Proud to be a Gandakians, carrying forward the values and discipline instilled at Gandaki Boarding School that continue to guide my journey of learning and growth.

projects.title: Personal AI Chat Assistant (RAG)
projects.description: Built a Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) chatbot that combines NestJS backend, Hugging Face LLM models, and vector databases to deliver highly relevant AI responses. Chat context is maintained using Redis, and knowledge embeddings are stored in Supabase for fast and scalable retrieval.
features: üí™RAG Architecture: Retrieves relevant knowledge from vector embeddings to augment AI responses.
1Ô∏è‚É£Multi-response LLM: Generates different AI responses based on context and user queries.
ü™®Supabase Vector DB: Stores embeddings and metadata for fast document retrieval.
üëåRedis Integration: Maintains chat context and history for personalized conversations.

projects.title: Blog Application
projects.description: A modern, full-featured blogging platform designed with robust security and seamless user experience in mind. The application supports CRUD operations for creating, reading, updating, and deleting blog posts, allowing users to manage content efficiently. It features user authentication to ensure secure access, and role-based access control to differentiate permissions for admins, authors, and regular users. Built with scalability and maintainability in mind, this app provides a clean, intuitive interface and a reliable backend for managing content dynamically.

projects.title: AI Ticket Assistant
projects.description:
AI Ticket Platform streamlines ticket management with the help of AI-driven automation.
Users can create tickets by providing a title and a short description ‚Äî and the backend (powered by AgentKit and Inngest) intelligently analyzes the request to determine priority, deadline, and suitable user assignment.

Note:
The backend is hosted for free on Render and may enter sleep mode.
To ensure full functionality, please wake it up by visiting:
üëâ https://full-stack-ai-agent-87lk.onrender.com/
features: AI automatically analyzes issue context using AgentKit and Inngest
Auto-assigns ticket to the most skilled user
AI decides priority, deadline, and skill requirements
Sends email notification to the assigned user with problem solving tips generated by AI

projects.title: Todo-List-App
projects.description: Todo List App Using Redux Toolkit for global state management

projects.title: Gantbaya
projects.description: Gantabya is a Next.js application for trip planning, location tracking, and sharing. It provides UIs for creating trips, adding locations, viewing maps, and building trip plans.
features: Interactive maps using Leaflet and routing via leaflet-routing-machine

projects.title: Personal Portfolio Website
projects.description: A modern, responsive personal portfolio website built to showcase my professional journey, technical skills, and projects as a Full Stack Developer. The site is designed with performance and scalability in mind, using Next.js, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS for a seamless user experience. Dynamic content such as skills, experiences, and project data is fetched from a Redis cache and Prisma-powered database, ensuring high-speed access and minimal load times. The portfolio also integrates SEO optimization, metadata management, and a CMS-like admin interface for effortless updates.
features: ‚ö° Fast and Scalable ‚Äì Utilizes server-side rendering and Redis caching for optimized performance.
üõ†Ô∏è Easily Updatable ‚Äì Backend integration allows updating data without redeployment.

projects.title: AI Terminal Chat Agent
projects.description: Developed an AI-powered terminal chat assistant using LangChain, enabling dynamic conversations with contextual memory and intelligent responses. Integrated custom tools and APIs to simulate a human-like terminal chat experience.

projects.title: Ecommerce Site - Kirana Nepal
projects.description: A full-featured e-commerce platform with product catalog, cart functionality, user authentication, and payment integration.
features: User authentication  and Role Based Acess

projects.title: AI Story Generator
projects.description: AI-powered storybook generator that creates personalized illustrated and narrated stories using Next.js, PostgreSQL Inngest, Agent Kit, Eleven Labs, and Redis.

projects.title: CodeLink
projects.description: CodeLink is a modern, full-stack collaborative platform that combines real-time code editing, audio meetings, AI-powered chat assistance, and seamless team collaboration ‚Äî all in one place.
features: Real Time Code Editor With Multiple Language Support With Audio

Full Stack Development with MERN Stack
certificates.description:
Successfully completed the MERN Stack Development Course from Digital Pathshala (Student ID: 6d6dc9) under the mentorship of Manish Basnet.
During the 3-month program, I learned to build full-fledged web applications using MongoDB, Express.js, React, and Node.js. The course enhanced my creativity, problem-solving, and debugging skills, strengthening my ability to design and develop scalable web solutions.
